I am a fourth-year Ph.D. student in Statistical Data Analysis at [Ghent University](https://www.ugent.be/en){target="blank" style="text-decoration: none"} under the supervision of Prof. Dr. [Stijn Vansteelandt](https://users.ugent.be/~svsteela/){target="blank" style="text-decoration: none"} (Ghent University) and Prof. Dr. [Christophe Ley](https://math.uni.lu/midas/people/dp/?christopheley){target="blank" style="text-decoration: none"} (University of Luxembourg). My research lies at the intersection of causal inference and debiased machine learning. If you want to get in touch, please don't hesitate to contact me.

## **Education**

-   Ph.D. in Statistical Data Analysis, Ghent University, Belgium\
    Aug 2022 - Aug 2028 (expected)

-   MSc in Mathematics, Ghent University, Belgium\
    Sept 2020 - June 2022

-   BSc in Mathematics, Ghent University, Belgium\
    Sept 2017 - June 2020
